text: The Disaster Artist is a 2017 American biographical comedy movie. It was directed by James Franco. The movie is based from Greg Sestero and Tom Bissell's 2013 non-fiction book of the same title. The movie is about an unlikely friendship between unknown actors Tommy Wiseau and Sestero that soon make the 2003 movie The Room. The Disaster Artist stars brothers James and Dave Franco as Wiseau and Sestero alongside Alison Brie, Ari Graynor, Josh Hutcherson, Jacki Weaver, and co-producer Seth Rogen. It was released on December 1, 2017 to strong positive reviews. ==References== Category:2010s biographical movies Category:2017 comedy movies Category:American biographical movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Movies based on books
title: The Disaster Artist (movie)
